item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, August 29, 2024 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Nvidia shares fall even as revenue more than doubles
2. Fears of rise in UK capital gains tax trigger selling ‘frenzy’
3. ‘Obscenely greedy’ oil executives handed Swiss jail terms for role in 1MDB fraud
4. Republicans worry Trump’s campaign strategy against Harris is failing
5. Which taxes can the UK government raise in the Autumn Budget?
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, August 29, 2024 at 11:15 AM UTC
